title: New: Henri Bardot – Figurine
body:
Absolutely adore this fragile new track from Portland’s **Henri Bardot**.

There’s elements of James Blake in the production, and a delicate rawness to the vocal that’s hugely endearing. Lifted from a new seven track EP titled Blue Night, _Figurine_ is out now. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Absolutely adore this fragile new track from Portland’s Henri Bardot. There’s elements of James Blake in the production, and a delicate rawness to the vocal that’s hugely endearing. Lifted from a new seven track EP titled Blue Night, Figurine is out now. Check it out below.
excerpt.short: Absolutely adore this fragile new track from Portland's Henri Bardot.
